# Starting from template

To start off, open a new RMarkdown file and on the left of the dialog box you will have an option to select "From Template". This will show templates that are available from the `vitae` package. To view examples of these templates check out the [README](https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae?tab=readme-ov-file){target="_blank"} for the package.
